tools.title: Audible
tools.description: My primary platform for consuming books through audiobooks, allowing me to learn while multitasking.
caveats: Monthly subscription required. Not all books are available in audio format.

useCases.title: Professional Development
items: Learn new skills through comprehensive guides

tools.title: Canva
tools.description: A rapidly expanding online design platform with templates and quick editing capabilities

tools.title: ChatGPT
tools.description: OpenAI's flagship conversational AI model. Currently using the Pro version for unlimited quota.
caveats: Knowledge cutoff date limits newest info, though Pro access helps.

tools.title: Chroma
tools.description: Open-source embedding database optimized for AI applications, offering vector search, document storage, full-text search, and multi-modal capabilities

tools.title: Claude
tools.description: Anthropic's LLM specialized in coding and complex queries
caveats: Can still produce incorrect answers despite high confidence

tools.title: Cloud Functions
tools.description: Serverless compute service I use for running asynchronous jobs like file processing and data vectorization
howToUse: Write function code in supported language
caveats: Cold start latency for infrequent calls

tools.title: Crawl4AI
tools.description: Open-source web crawler optimized for LLM-friendly data extraction with smart content filtering and structured output formats

tools.title: Cursor
tools.description: AI-powered code editor (VS Code fork) for enhanced development flow
caveats: As with any AI coding tool, outputs must be verified

tools.title: Discord
tools.description: Flexible communication platform with extensive integrations and channel organization
caveats: Interface can feel overwhelming, better suited for large teams than small intimate groups

tools.title: Firebase
tools.description: Google's platform for building and scaling web and mobile applications with serverless backend services
caveats: Costs can scale quickly with usage

tools.title: GitGuardian
tools.description: Security platform that helps detect and prevent secrets from being exposed in code repositories
howToUse: Set up alerts for secret detection
caveats: Some advanced features require paid plans
May require team buy-in for effective usage
Needs proper configuration to avoid false positives

useCases.title: Secret Detection
items: Detection of API keys and credentials

tools.title: GitHub
tools.description: Version control and collaboration platform for code hosting and development
howToUse: Project management with Issues and Projects
caveats: Some advanced features require paid plans
Need to be careful with sensitive data

tools.title: Google Calendar
tools.description: Cloud-based calendar for scheduling and event management
caveats: Advanced features might require third-party add-ons

tools.title: Google
tools.description: General-purpose search engine for deep research
caveats: Can be cluttered with ads, less direct answers than AI search

tools.title: Granola
tools.description: AI notepad that enhances meeting notes with transcription and GPT-4
howToUse: Use AI to enhance notes post-meeting
caveats: Works on Mac only for direct audio transcription

tools.title: Hugging Face Spaces
tools.description: Directory and hosting platform for AI applications, offering a searchable collection of community-built models, demos, and tools with easy deployment

tools.title: Magic Patterns
tools.description: AI-powered UI prototyping tool for quickly generating and iterating on components and designs, with export to React or Figma

tools.title: Midjourney
tools.description: AI image generation specialized in artistic and imaginative visuals
caveats: Requires Discord and prompt engineering skills

tools.title: Motion
tools.description: Modern animation library for creating native app-like animations in React applications
howToUse: Use animate prop for basic animations

tools.title: Notion
tools.description: All-in-one workspace for docs, wikis, and simple project management
caveats: Can be cumbersome to keep up-to-date
Not the fastest for capturing ephemeral notes

tools.title: OpenRouter
tools.description: Unified API interface for accessing multiple LLM models with better pricing, uptime, and no subscription requirements
howToUse: Make API calls through unified interface

tools.title: Pinokio
tools.description: Browser-based tool for installing, running, and managing server applications locally with one-click installation and management capabilities

tools.title: NPM
tools.description: Node Package Manager, the standard package manager for JavaScript and Node.js applications
caveats: Can be slower than alternatives like pnpm
Global installations can cause version conflicts
Flat dependency tree can cause issues

tools.title: PNPM
tools.description: Fast, disk space efficient package manager that uses hard links and strict dependency management for better Node.js development
howToUse: Install globally with npm i -g pnpm
Enable strict mode for better security
Use pnpm import to migrate from npm/yarn
caveats: Some tools may not support pnpm

tools.title: Speechify
tools.description: AI-powered text-to-speech tool for listening to articles, documents, and written content with natural-sounding voices

tools.title: Spline
tools.description: Browser-based 3D design tool for creating and exporting interactive web experiences with WebGL, featuring real-time collaboration

tools.title: Storybook
tools.description: Frontend workshop for building UI components and pages in isolation, with support for testing, documentation, and visual development

tools.title: super.so
tools.description: Wraps Notion pages on a custom domain with additional styling/themes
howToUse: Creating polished docs sites from Notion pages
caveats: Some advanced features behind a paywall

tools.title: TanStack Query
tools.description: Powerful asynchronous state management and data fetching library for React applications
howToUse: Use hooks like useQuery and useMutation
caveats: TypeScript setup needed for best experience

tools.title: Telegram
tools.description: Cross-platform messaging app with bot integration capabilities
caveats: Less ubiquitous than WhatsApp or iMessage in some circles

tools.title: ToDesktop
tools.description: No-code platform for converting web applications into native desktop apps with Electron, featuring native functionality and customizable UI

tools.title: Unicorn Studio
tools.description: WebGL-powered website builder for creating immersive 3D web experiences with no-code interface

tools.title: Vercel
tools.description: Platform for deploying and hosting web applications with seamless Git integration
howToUse: Deploy Next.js and other frontend applications
caveats: Some advanced features require paid plans
Limited build minutes on free tier

tools.title: YouTube
tools.description: A vast platform for learning through video content, tutorials, and educational channels
howToUse: 1. Subscribe to educational channels in your areas of interest
2. Create playlists to organize videos by topic
3. Use the Watch Later feature for content you want to revisit
4. Enable notifications for channels you want to follow closely
5. Use playback speed controls to optimize learning time
6. Take advantage of chapters in videos to jump to relevant sections
7. Read comments for additional insights and resources
caveats: Can be a source of distraction with recommended videos
Quality of content varies significantly between creators
Need to verify credibility of information sources
Easy to fall into passive consumption instead of active learning
Algorithms may not always surface the most educational content

tools.title: Bland.ai
tools.description: AI-powered voice calling platform that enables automated phone calls with natural-sounding voices
howToUse: Set up API key and configuration
Define call scripts and voice parameters
caveats: Requires careful script design for natural conversations
Need to handle call failures gracefully

tools.title: Anki
tools.description: Spaced repetition flashcard program that helps with efficient memorization and long-term retention
howToUse: Add cards with questions and answers
Review cards daily using spaced repetition

tools.title: Replit
tools.description: Cloud-based development environment that enables coding in any language with zero setup
howToUse: Create new projects or import existing ones
caveats: Some advanced features need paid plan
